seed_pair: Then I will never trust anyone ever again.
Entonces nunca confiaré en nadie nunca más.
seeds.extraction_reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'Then'→'entonces' (clear temporal connector A-type). 'I will never trust'→'nunca confiaré' (M-type showing future+negation). 'trust anyone'→'confiaré en nadie' (M-type showing verb+required preposition+object, overlaps with previous on 'confiaré'). 'ever again'→'nunca más' (M-type temporal intensifier). BACKWARD SWEEP: Creates 'nadie nunca más'/'anyone ever again' (connects object with temporal intensifier). 'en nadie'/'in anyone' (prepositional phrase useful for verbs requiring 'en'). OVERLAPS: 'nunca confiaré' + 'confiaré en nadie' share 'confiaré'; 'en nadie' + 'nadie nunca más' share 'nadie'; creates overlapping chain for maximum recombination. All chunks pass Heuristic 1 (zero uncertainty), overlaps serve Heuristic 2 (maximize patterns).

seed_pair: I love the way you try to help.
Me encanta la forma en que intentas ayudar.
seeds.extraction_reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I love'→'Me encanta' (M-type, important construction for expressing love of activities/things). 'the way'→'la forma en que' (M-type, complete relative pronoun construction, requires 'en que' to connect clause). 'you try'→'intentas' (A-type, conjugated verb). 'to help'→'ayudar' (A-type, infinitive). BACKWARD SWEEP: From right: 'ayudar' covered; 'intentas ayudar' (verb+infinitive pattern, pedagogically valuable); 'la forma en que intentas ayudar' (full complement of 'me encanta'). OVERLAPS: 'Me encanta'+'Me encanta la forma en que' share start; 'la forma en que'+'la forma en que intentas ayudar' share construction; 'intentas'+'intentas ayudar' share verb. Creates overlapping chains showing: (1) 'me encanta' with various objects, (2) 'la forma en que' relative clauses, (3) 'intentas' with different infinitives. All chunks pass Heuristic 1, overlaps maximize patterns per Heuristic 2.
